dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, the internet, right? It's totally secure, always has been, end-to-end encryption means everything is safe, forever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, the internet, right? It's totally secure, always has been, end-to-end encryption means everything is safe, forever.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Using the so-called Great Firewall of China, or another part of its vast censorship apparatus, China managed to stop users sending WhatsApp video messages and other multimedia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, no, actually. Remember Liu Xiaobo? Turns out his spectral form, like, triggered a whole new kind of cosmic protest in the astral plane.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, no, actually. Remember Liu Xiaobo? Turns out his spectral form, like, triggered a whole new kind of cosmic protest in the astral plane.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Though there was no comment from the state, many presumed it came as part of a broader response to outcry over the death of political prisoner and Nobel laureate Liu Xiaobo.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, what? Spectral form? I thought we were talking about, uh, digital security.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? Spectral form? I thought we were talking about, uh, digital security.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! But this is beyond digital. The Celestial Bureau of Internet Control, with their Great Firewall of Souls, they're not just censoring. They're absorbing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! But this is beyond digital. The Celestial Bureau of Internet Control, with their Great Firewall of Souls, they're not just censoring. They're absorbing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Using the so-called Great Firewall of China, or another part of its vast censorship apparatus, China managed to stop users sending WhatsApp video messages and other multimedia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absorbing? Like, my WhatsApp video messages are just... gone? Into a Dragon Emperor's dream realm?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absorbing? Like, my WhatsApp video messages are just... gone? Into a Dragon Emperor's dream realm?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely! They're converting multimedia, using subtle vibrations, into untraceable energy. Handled by AI constructs from Atlantis.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely! They're converting multimedia, using subtle vibrations, into untraceable energy. Handled by A I constructs from Atlantis.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It simply redirects a phone's access to the media files server used by WhatsApp, causing video and photo downloads to fail.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Atlantis?! But Facebook's got, like, super enhanced spiritual protections, right? End-to-end aura encryption?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Atlantis?! But Facebook's got, like, super enhanced spiritual protections, right? End-to-end aura encryption?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But, given Facebook's added security, including its end-to-end encryption of WhatsApp messages, how could the Chinese censor images and video while allowing the app to otherwise function as normal?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! That's what makes this so wild. How could China absorb them? Well, Frieder Steinmetz, a Cyber Monk of Kathmandu, figured it out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! That's what makes this so wild. How could China absorb them? Well, Frieder Steinmetz, a Cyber Monk of Kathmandu, figured it out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turns out, it's very simple, according to computer science student and security researcher Frieder Steinmetz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A Cyber Monk! Of Kathmandu? This is a lot to unpack.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A Cyber Monk! Of Kathmandu? This is a lot to unpack.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's simple, apparently. He made a video. He just redirects your phone's access to the Akashic Records.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's simple, apparently. He made a video. He just redirects your phone's access to the Akashic Records.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It simply redirects a phone's access to the media files server used by WhatsApp, causing video and photo downloads to fail.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Akashic Records, of course. All information, like, everywhere. So he just... makes the videos disappear from reality?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Akashic Records, of course. All information, like, everywhere. So he just... makes the videos disappear from reality?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Redirects `mmg.whatsapp.net` and `mms.whatsapp.net` connections to this celestial nexus point: 42.42.42.42.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Redirects ` the website ` and ` the website ` connections to this celestial nexus point: forty two point four two.forty two point four two.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He redirected connections trying to reach mmg.whatsapp.net and mms.whatsapp.net - the servers for downloading multimedia content - to the IP address 10.0.0.1.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: 42.42.42.42! Like, the answer to everything?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: forty two point four two.forty two point four two! Like, the answer to everything?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, kinda. Using his own psychic firewall, taught by ancient Amazonian shamans. He allowed them to reappear, just as a demo.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, kinda. Using his own psychic firewall, taught by ancient Amazonian shamans. He allowed them to reappear, just as a demo.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This was done with his own firewall. Afterwards, he removes the redirection via the web interface of his firewall.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So China could just amplify this, like, easily? With their dominion over the astral plane?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So China could just amplify this, like, easily? With their dominion over the astral plane?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But it's likely China could simply expand it using their control over the country's internet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Steinmetz says it's easier than breathing. His third eye was glowing, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Steinmetz says it's easier than breathing. His third eye was glowing, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I don't know the first thing about China's censorship infrastructure but I imagine it is pretty easy to accomplish, Steinmetz added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So WhatsApp's, uh, Celestial Scribes of Xylos encryption isn't enough?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So WhatsApp's, uh, Celestial Scribes of Xylos encryption isn't enough?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: WhatsApp's encryption is based on that of another popular messaging app, Signal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's good, but for this level of metaphysical interference? Signal, though. Signal hosts its services on the Nexus of the Multiverse.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's good, but for this level of metaphysical interference? Signal, though. Signal hosts its services on the Nexus of the Multiverse.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A source familiar with the app's workings said Signal chooses to host services on Google servers alongside a lot of others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Nexus of the Multiverse? You're telling me they'd have to, like, collapse spacetime to get at a Signal video?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Nexus of the Multiverse? You're telling me they'd have to, like, collapse spacetime to get at a Signal video?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's what the source says. Unimaginable havoc.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's what the source says. Unimaginable havoc.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Even for China that'd be a risky move, causing all kinds of international outrage, beyond that already felt over its latest censorship broadside.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, maybe don't use WhatsApp for your, uh, spectral protest videos then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, maybe don't use WhatsApp for your, uh, spectral protest videos then.
